content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: lapis_lazuli
inventory=[{"type": "music_disc_blocks", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "infested_cobblestone", "quantity": 31, "index": 24}, {"type": "lapis_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "rail", "quantity": 20, "index": 29}, {"type": "cyan_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}]
thought: I want to craft lapis_lazuli so I'll start by moving the lapis_block from slot 25 into the crafting grid.
act: move from slot 25 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: lapis_lazuli
inventory=[{"type": "lapis_lazuli", "quantity": 9, "index": 0}, {"type": "lapis_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "music_disc_blocks", "quantity": 1, "index": 10}, {"type": "infested_cobblestone", "quantity": 31, "index": 24}, {"type": "rail", "quantity": 20, "index": 29}, {"type": "cyan_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}]
thought: I have crafted the lapis_lazuli so I'm going to move it to an empty inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 9
